author: igv4321
body:
Creating an intermediate collection to hold the extended information for split-anode Phase 1 HF PMT readouts. When we understand better how to use the TDC data from the QIE10 front-end chips, a collection of HFRecHit objects will be created from this one.

This pull request does not modify any existing data structures or algorithms.
title: Initial implementation of the pre-reco stage for the Phase 1 HF reco
